column1: Grof is a Dwarves from the Blue Mountains in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. He appears on the marketplace of Bree
column2: where he sells several goods. He was asked by a Bree-men
column5: so he could arm the towns of Bree-land. Grof originally refused
column7: Andriel and Farin (video game character) talked with him
column9: he changed his view. Grof then returned to his home in the Blue Mountains to forge weapons for the Bree-landers.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
